trans-unit.source: Represents the address of an electronic mail sender or recipient.
trans-unit.target: Representerer adressen til en e-post avsender eller mottaker.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"></xref> class using the specified address.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte adressen.

trans-unit.source: The `address` parameter can contain a display name and the associated e-mail address if you enclose the address in angle brackets.
trans-unit.target: Den `address` parameteren kan inneholde visningsnavn og tilknyttede e-postadressen Hvis du setter adressen i vinkelen hakeparenteser.

trans-unit.source: For example: `"Tom Smith <tsmith@contoso.com>"` White space is permitted between the display name and the angle brackets.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel: `"Tom Smith <tsmith@contoso.com>"` mellomrom er tillatt mellom visningsnavnet og vinkelen hakeparenteser.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the property values for a <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress> object constructed using the preceding example address.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapsverdiene for en <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress>objektet konstruert ved hjelp av foregående eksempel-adressen.</xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.DisplayName%2A>|`"Tom Smith"`| |<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.Host%2A>|`"contoso.com"`| |<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.User%2A>|`"tsmith"`| |<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.Address%2A>|`"tsmith@contoso.com"`|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.DisplayName%2A>| `"Tom Smith"`| | <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.Host%2A>| `"contoso.com"`| | <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.User%2A>| `"tsmith"`| | <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.Address%2A>| `"tsmith@contoso.com"`|</xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.Address%2A></xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.User%2A></xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.Host%2A></xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder en e-postadresse.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> ("").
trans-unit.target: er <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> ("").

trans-unit.source: is not in a recognized format.
trans-unit.target: er ikke i et format som gjenkjennes.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"></xref> class using the specified address and display name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte adressen og visningsnavnet.

trans-unit.source: Leading and trailing white space in the display name is preserved.
trans-unit.target: Innledende og avsluttende mellomrom i visningsnavnet beholdes.

trans-unit.source: If `displayName` contains non-ASCII characters, the iso-8859-1 character set is used for the `displayName` encoding.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `displayName` inneholder ikke-ASCII-tegn, iso-8859-1 tegnsettet brukes for det `displayName` koding.

trans-unit.source: Encoding non-ASCII characters is discussed in RFC 1522, which is available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org).
trans-unit.target: Koding ikke ASCII-tegn er beskrevet i RFC 1522, som er tilgjengelig på [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org).

trans-unit.source: If `address` contains a display name, and `displayName` is not `null` and is not equal to <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>, `displayName` overrides the value specified in `address`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `address` inneholder et visningsnavn og `displayName` er ikke `null` og er ikke lik <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>, `displayName` overstyrer verdien angitt i `address`.</xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder en e-postadresse.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the display name associated with `address`.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder visningsnavnet tilknyttet `address`.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> ("").
trans-unit.target: er <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> ("").

trans-unit.source: is not in a recognized format.
trans-unit.target: er ikke i et format som gjenkjennes.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - eller -

trans-unit.source: contains non-ASCII characters.
trans-unit.target: inneholder ikke-ASCII-tegn.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"></xref> class using the specified address, display name, and encoding.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte adressen, visningsnavn og koding.

trans-unit.source: Leading and trailing white space in the display name is preserved.
trans-unit.target: Innledende og avsluttende mellomrom i visningsnavnet beholdes.

trans-unit.source: If `address` contains a display name, and `displayName` is not `null` and is not equal to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, `displayName` overrides the value specified in `address`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `address` inneholder et visningsnavn og `displayName` er ikke `null` og er ikke lik <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, `displayName` overstyrer verdien angitt i `address`.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The MailAddress method does not check if the `displayName` parameter is valid.
trans-unit.target: Metoden MailAddress kontrollerer ikke hvis den `displayName` parameteren er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: This method removes surrounding quotes not displayed by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.DisplayName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fjerner omkringliggende anførselstegn vises ikke av den <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.DisplayName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Quotes will be added before transmission, except where <xref:System.Text.Encoding.ASCII%2A> or <xref:System.Text.Encoding.Unicode%2A> is specified in the `displayNameEncoding` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Anførselstegn legges før overføringen, unntatt der <xref:System.Text.Encoding.ASCII%2A>eller <xref:System.Text.Encoding.Unicode%2A>er angitt i den `displayNameEncoding` parameteren.</xref:System.Text.Encoding.Unicode%2A> </xref:System.Text.Encoding.ASCII%2A>

trans-unit.source: The encoding specified in the `displayNameEncoding` parameter will be applied to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.DisplayName%2A> property before transmission <xref:System.Text.Encoding.ASCII%2A> or <xref:System.Text.Encoding.Unicode%2A> is specified in the `displayNameEncoding` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Kodingen som er angitt i den `displayNameEncoding` parameteren vil bli brukt på den <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.DisplayName%2A>egenskap før overføring <xref:System.Text.Encoding.ASCII%2A>eller <xref:System.Text.Encoding.Unicode%2A>er angitt i den `displayNameEncoding` parameteren.</xref:System.Text.Encoding.Unicode%2A> </xref:System.Text.Encoding.ASCII%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A> is the default encoding if none is specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A>er det standardkodingen Hvis ingen er angitt.</xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on supported mail address formats, see <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om støttede e-postadressen formater, kan du se <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder en e-postadresse.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the display name associated with `address`.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder visningsnavnet tilknyttet `address`.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.Encoding> that defines the character set used for `displayName`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Text.Encoding>som definerer tegnsettet som brukes for `displayName`.</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- displayName is .
trans-unit.target: -or- displayName is .

trans-unit.source: is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> ("").
trans-unit.target: er <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> ("").

trans-unit.source: -or- displayName is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> ("").
trans-unit.target: - eller - displayName er <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> ("").

trans-unit.source: is not in a recognized format.
trans-unit.target: er ikke i et format som gjenkjennes.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - eller -

trans-unit.source: contains non-ASCII characters.
trans-unit.target: inneholder ikke-ASCII-tegn.

trans-unit.source: Gets the e-mail address specified when this instance was created.
trans-unit.target: Henter den e-postadressen som er angitt under denne forekomsten ble opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by this property does not include the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.DisplayName%2A> information.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres av denne egenskapen ikke inneholder den <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.DisplayName%2A>informasjon.</xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder e-postadressen.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the display name composed from the display name and address information specified when this instance was created.
trans-unit.target: Henter visningsnavnet består fra visningsnavnet og adresseinformasjon angitt når denne forekomsten ble opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Display names that contain non-ASCII characters are returned in human-readable form.
trans-unit.target: Visningsnavn som inneholder ikke-ASCII-tegn returneres i lesbar form.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.ToString%2A> method to get the encoded form of the DisplayName.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.ToString%2A>metode for å hente kodet form av visningsnavn.</xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some software programs that are used to read e-mail display the DisplayName property value instead of, or in addition to, the e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Noen programmer som brukes til å lese e-post vises visningsnavnet egenskapsverdien i stedet for og i tillegg til e-postadressen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the display name; otherwise, <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> ("") if no display name information was specified when this instance was created.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder visningen navnet; ellers, <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> ("") Hvis ingen viser informasjon om ble angitt da denne forekomsten ble opprettet.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Compares two mail addresses.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligner to e-postadresser.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"></xref> instance to compare to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"> </xref> forekomst til å sammenligne den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two mail addresses are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis de to e-postadressene er like. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash value for a mail address.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en hash-verdien for en e-postadresse.

trans-unit.source: The GetHashCode method returns a hash code of the mail address.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetHashCode returnerer en hash-kode på e-postadressen.

trans-unit.source: This value can be used as a key in hash tables.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan brukes som en nøkkel i hash-tabeller.

trans-unit.source: An integer hash value.
trans-unit.target: En hash heltallsverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the host portion of the address specified when this instance was created.
trans-unit.target: Henter vertsdelen av adressen angitt når denne forekomsten ble opprettet.

trans-unit.source: In a typical e-mail address, the host string includes all information following the "`@`" sign.
trans-unit.target: Strengen som vert inkluderer alle informasjon følgende på en vanlig e-postadresse i "`@`" logg.

trans-unit.source: For example, in `"tsmith@contoso.com"`, the host is `"contoso.com"`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel i `"tsmith@contoso.com"`, verten er `"contoso.com"`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the host computer that accepts e-mail for the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.User*> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder navnet på vertsdatamaskinen som godtar e-posten for den <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.User*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.User*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en strengrepresentasjon av denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the contents of this <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder innholdet for dette <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the user information from the address specified when this instance was created.
trans-unit.target: Henter brukerinformasjonen fra adressen angitt når denne forekomsten ble opprettet.

trans-unit.source: In a typical e-mail address, the user string includes all information preceding the "`@`" sign.
trans-unit.target: Brukerstrengen som inkluderer all informasjon foregående på en vanlig e-postadresse i "`@`" logg.

trans-unit.source: For example, in `"tsmith@contoso.com"`, the user is `"tsmith"`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel i `"tsmith@contoso.com"`, brukeren `"tsmith"`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the user name portion of the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.Address*>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder den bruker Navnedelen av <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.Address*>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress.Address*> </xref:System.String>
